challenge.title: Open Goldberg Variations - Kimiko Ishizaka
challenge.description: This recording is the first fan-funded, open source, and completely free recording ever produced.
challenge.instructions: Listen to Bach's Goldberg Variations as performed by Kimiko Ishizaka - dedicated into the public domain!
